plot: After dying, Howard is sent to work for Plots of Heaven, an agency that sells reservations to Heaven, and in the process learns that he wasn't motivated in the right places.
title: Plots of Heaven
plot_es: After dying, Howard is sent to work for Plots of Heaven, an agency that sells reservations to Heaven, and in the process learns that he wasn't motivated in the right places.
plot_en: After dying, Howard is sent to work for Plots of Heaven, an agency that sells reservations to Heaven, and in the process learns that he wasn't motivated in the right places.
